description:
This talk was recorded at BeeScala 2016 in Ljubljana, Slovenia. Follow along on Twitter @BeeScalaConf and on the website for more information http://bee-scala.org.

Abstract:

We will start from the very basics and learn how Akka actor model applies properly in business logic, software infrastructure as well as in managing UI. In the end we will take a look at some of the features under development and what we are trying to achieve.
title: BeeScala 2016: Andrea Peruffo - Don’t call me frontend framework! A quick ride on Akka.Js
